title: My thoughts on League
body: Honestly I regret ever playing this game because RIOT doesn't do anything to help make the game better there are so many broken champions everytime I vs a Lux I litteraly start crying at one point in the game because im so pissed off at how much RIOT points i spent on this steaming pile of shit game that I hsould get every thing in the fuckign game free I hate this game it's not even fun I dont even care about anything RT im in a lolo game right now and i just dont care I hate RIOT so much because they crank out stupid updates like INSTEAD OF FROZEN MALLET HAVING 650 HEALTH LETSA GIVE EIT 700 HERP MY DERP making try getting rid of lux's r%%%%%ed 40 second ult that does only like 400 damage and is EASY AS ALL HELL honestly if I could do anything to go back in time I would never have started playing LoL I will continou to play this stemaing pile of shit because I spent money on it and I enjoy it 2% of the time unless I exit the game because my "stomach hurts" which is what I say to stop playing the stupid game and I say "I vomited I'm gonna leave" so that way I can leave without being banned for 20 kminutes in a 20 minute game

replies.body:
Tried reading, could not comprehend wall of illiterate rage.

Kid, you are too young for PvP online games. You have no control, and apparently cannot cope with loosing.

 Just spare yourself the pain and go play something non-competitive for a few years instead of raging on the forums about non-issues.
Well im actually not the worst at LoL I was just bitching about Lux and how not broken she is
